name: 王勇
abstracts: The Optimization & Computational Systems Biology Lab is in the Institute of Applied Mathematics at Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science (AMSS) at Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS). We also belong to the National Center for Mathematics and Interdisciplinary Sciences (NCMIS) at Chinese Academy of Sciences. Our research focuses on optimization, computational biology, and systems biology. We aim to construct networks for complex biomolecular systems such as gene regulatory networks via optimization and statistics models. By further integrating multiple data sources into network models, we aim to elucidate the relationship between sequence variant, regulatory element, regulator, gene expression, and evolution of biomolecular systems, to probe design principles of biological regulations and networks, and to investigate systems biology mechanisms of complex traits. To achieve these aims, we develop diverse computational methods ranging from theory, model, and algorithm.
directions:
Gene Regulatory Network Modeling
Computational Systems Biology
Data Integration and Modeling
Optimization and Statistics Models

name: 张俊华
abstracts: Junhua Zhang 于1995年在中国科学院系统科学研究所获得运筹学与控制论博士学位。现在她是中国科学院数学与系统科学研究院应用数学研究所的副教授。张博士是生物信息学中心、国家数学与跨学科科学中心和中国科学院随机复杂结构与数据科学重点实验室的研究员。她是多个国际期刊的审稿人，包括Cancer Research, Scientific Reports, Bioinformatics等。张博士在概率论、随机逼近及其应用、模式识别中的特征提取、信息度量及其应用等领域工作。她目前的研究兴趣包括计算系统生物学、数据挖掘和网络科学。

网络科学
信息度量

name: 周川
abstracts: Dr. Chuan Zhou is an associate professor in Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science, Chinese Academy of Sciences, from which he received the Ph.D. degree in 2013 under the supervision of Prof. Zhi-Ming Ma. His research interests lie in the development of probabilistic methods and stochastic models for solving scientific problems arising from social computing, graph computing, graph machine learning, and semantic information. He has published more than 100 papers in the prestigious journals and conferences of mathematics, artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data mining including Tohoku Math. J, TPAMI, TKDE, TNNLS, TOIS, ICML, NeurIPS, AAAI, KDD, IJCAI, ICDM, CIKM, and WWW with 5,500+ citations and an H-index of 42 according to Google Scholar. Dr. Zhou won the outstanding doctoral dissertation of Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2014, the best paper award of ICCS-14, the best student paper awards of IJCNN-17 and ICDM-21. He was selected as a member of Youth Innovation Promotion Association of Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2016 and Jingrun Chen Future Star of AMSS in 2019. He serves as the secretary general of CSIAM Activity Group on Math in ICT. He also served as senior PC/PC/reviewer for top-tier conferences including NeurIPS, AAAI, KDD, IJCAI, ICDM, SDM, and WWW for many times.
directions:
Social Computing
Graph Computing
Graph Machine Learning
Semantic Information
